I've identified the following specialization points in the provided build file:

1. `GPU Build`: This is specified by the `{ "gpu_build" : { ... } }` section of the JSON schema.
2. `GPU Backends`: This is specified by the `{ "gpu_backends" : { ... } }` section of the JSON schema.
3. `Parallel Programming Libraries`: This is specified by the `{ "parallel_programming_libraries" : { ... } }` section of the JSON schema.
4. `Linear Algebra Libraries`: This is specified by the `{ "linear_algebra_libraries" : { ... } }` section of the JSON schema.
5. `FFT Libraries`: This is specified by the `{ "FFT_libraries" : { ... } }` section of the JSON schema.
6. `Other External Libraries`: This is specified by the `{ "other_external_libraries" : { ... } }` section of the JSON schema.
7. `Compiler Flags`: This is specified by the `"compiler_flags"` property in the JSON schema, which is an array of strings.
8. `Optimization Build Flags`: This is specified by the `"optimization_build_flags"` property in the JSON schema, which is an array of strings.
9. `Compilers`: This is specified by the `{ "compilers" : { ... } }` section of the JSON schema.
10. `Architectures`: This is specified by the `"architectures"` property in the JSON schema, which is an array of strings.
11. `SIMD Vectorization`: This is specified by the `{ "simd_vectorization" : { ... } }` section of the JSON schema.
12. `Build System`: This is specified by the `{ "build_system" : { ... } }` section of the JSON schema.
13. `Internal Build`: This is specified by the `{ "internal_build" : { ... } }` section of the JSON schema.

These specialization points are likely related to various build configurations, compiler options, and library dependencies required for building and compiling code.
